text.text: People say this ice cream shop offers a wide variety of delicious desserts, including funnel cakes, churros, milkshakes, and Dubai chocolate strawberries. They highlight the cute and festive atmosphere, especially during the Christmas season, and the fun igloo rentals. They also like the friendly and helpful staff.

places.formattedAddress: 2923 Virginia Beach Blvd, Virginia Beach, VA 23452

text.text: People say this cafe offers delicious, fresh pastries, including honey cake, mousse pastries, and lemon tarts, as well as savory sandwiches and crepes. They highlight the beautiful presentation of the desserts, the cozy and inviting atmosphere, and the friendly and helpful staff. They also like the homemade taste and the use of fresh ingredients.

Ice people say this ice cream shop offers unique Indian flavors like Gulab Jamun and Thandai, alongside classic flavors like pistachio and tiramisu. They also highlight the friendly and welcoming staff, and the inviting atmosphere.

places.formattedAddress: 3229 Virginia Beach Blvd, Virginia Beach, VA 23452

displayName.text: The Yard Milkshake Bar Of Virginia Beach

text.text:
People say this ice cream shop offers delicious milkshakes with generous pieces of fruit and a huge selection of ice cream flavors. They also highlight the patient and kind service, and the fun, family-friendly atmosphere.

Other reviews mention the prices can be high.

places.formattedAddress: 4512 Princess Anne Rd Suite #203, Virginia Beach, VA 23462

text.text:
People say this bakery serves delicious bagels, including the French toast bagel with cinnamon raisin walnut spread, and the lox bagel. They also highlight the friendly staff and quick service.

Other reviews mention the bagels can be expensive.

places.formattedAddress: 209 Central Park Ave, Virginia Beach, VA 23462

text.text:
People say this bakery offers delicious, customizable cinnamon rolls with a wide variety of toppings and flavors, as well as other treats like cookie dough and loaf cake. They also highlight the fair prices, generous portions, and clean, modern atmosphere.

Other reviews mention the service can be slow.

People say this bakery offers delicious pandesal, ube bread, and ube hopia. They highlight the fresh breads, the generous fillings in the stuffed breads, and the flavorful pastries. They also like the friendly and efficient service.

places.formattedAddress: 1716 Pleasure House Rd #104, Virginia Beach, VA 23455

text.text: People say this bakery offers delicious cupcakes, cookies, and other baked goods, including gluten-free options. They highlight the reasonable prices and the cute, welcoming atmosphere. They also like the friendly and helpful staff.

People say this ice cream shop offers delicious, creamy gelato with unique and traditional flavors, such as goat cheese blueberry, tiramisu, and pistachio. They highlight the homemade gelato, waffle cones, and the use of natural ingredients. They also like the friendly and welcoming service, and the clean and cute atmosphere.

places.formattedAddress: 4224 Virginia Beach Blvd #103, Virginia Beach, VA 23452

text.text:
People say this bakery offers delicious mochi donuts, Korean corn dogs, and strawberry shortcake. They also highlight the cute vibe, friendly staff, and fresh food.

Other reviews mention the donuts can be expensive.

places.formattedAddress: 3916 Virginia Beach Blvd, Virginia Beach, VA 23452

text.text: People say this bakery offers delicious vegan and gluten-free desserts, including cinnamon rolls, donuts, cupcakes, and brownies. They highlight the generous portions, fresh ingredients, and the wide variety of options, including savory items and dog treats. They also like the friendly staff and welcoming atmosphere.

places.formattedAddress: 4540 Princess Anne Rd UNIT 114, Virginia Beach, VA 23462

text.text: People say this dessert shop offers a wide variety of delicious desserts, including crepes, boba, ice cream, and Asian-inspired options with jellies and beans. They highlight the food is tasty, the portions are generous, and the menu features unconventional yet delicious options. They also like the chic and relaxing atmosphere, and the fast service.

places.formattedAddress: 4540 Princess Anne Rd #110, Virginia Beach, VA 23462

text.text: People say this dessert shop offers a fantastic selection of toppings. They highlight the great prices and friendly service. They also like the true frozen yogurt flavor with probiotic tartness.

People say this ice cream shop offers a wide selection of ice cream flavors, frozen treats, and Mexican snacks, including churros, mangonadas, and bionicos. They highlight the fun, inviting, and colorful atmosphere, and the friendly and helpful staff. They also like the clean and spacious location.

places.formattedAddress: 2724 Virginia Beach Blvd, Virginia Beach, VA 23452
4485 Virginia Beach Blvd, Virginia Beach, VA 23462

text.text: People say this ice cream shop offers delicious ice cream with many flavors. They highlight the ice cream is creamy and the staff is friendly. They also like the cute merch.

People say this ice cream shop offers a wide variety of flavors, including seasonal specials, and dairy-free and gluten-free options. They highlight the ice cream is rich, creamy, and homemade tasting, and the waffle cones are freshly made. They also like the friendly and helpful staff, and the welcoming atmosphere.

places.formattedAddress: 5386 Kemps River Dr Ste 108-109, Virginia Beach, VA 23464

text.text:
People say this bakery offers delicious cakes, desserts, and halo-halo. They also highlight the fast service and friendly staff.

Other reviews mention the cakes can be expensive.
